headline: BlackRock Is Near Deal to Buy Private Credit Manager HPS
summary: (Bloomberg) -- BlackRock Inc. is nearing a deal to buy HPS Investment Partners, a purchase that would vault the firm into the top ranks of private credit as it seeks to become a major force in alternative assets.Most Read from BloombergRiyadh Metro Partially Opens in Bid to Ease City’s Traffic JamsIn Traffic-Weary Toronto, a Battle Breaks Out Over Bike LanesAn agreement could be announced as early as the coming week and value HPS at $12 billion or more, according to people with knowledge of the
